alert.note: Alert for Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:11AM EDT until April 01 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hillsdale County in southeastern Michigan... Northwestern Williams County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1211 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Jonesville to near Edon, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hillsdale, Jonesville, Pioneer, Edon, Jerome, Somerset, Cambria, Pittsford, Moscow, Ransom, Waldron, Camden, North Adams, Bear Lake, Prattville, Lake Wilson, Lake Seneca, Shadyside, Osseo and Bridgewater Center. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 2 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana.
